Title: Java Developer
Description:
About the job
INSOFT – tai ilgametę patirtį IT sektoriuje sukaupusi įmonė, kurianti individualizuotą programinę įrangą organizacijoms visame pasaulyje. Tikime, kad išskirtinius rezultatus pasiekia išskirtinės komandos, todėl kompetencija ir profesionalumas yra pagrindinės vertybės, kurias puoselėjame bei kurių tikimės iš kiekvieno komandos nario. Ieškome – tiek patirties turinčių specialistų, tiek šios srities naujokų! Turime biurus tiek Vilniuje, tiek Kaune.

DARBO POBŪDIS:
WEB aplikacijų kūrimas naudojant JAVA backend ir Angular 2+ frontend;
Naujų verslo sprendimų kūrimas pagal užsakovo poreikius;
Programinės įrangos komponentų kūrimas ir priežiūra;
Sistemų kūrimas nuo kodo rašymo iki diegimo naudojant CI/CD įrankius;
Kodo rašymas remiantis gerosiomis rinkos praktikomis.

MES TIKIMĖS, KAD:
Turite aukštąjį išsilavinimą IT srityje (gali būti studentas);
Esate kruopštus, atsakingas ir motyvuotas;
Turite 2 m. ir daugiau patirties;
Turite patirties dirbant Agile scrum komandoje;
Turite patirties su Angular, Spring boot, REST API, SQL;
Esate susipažinęs su JMS, ELK stack, Docker (optional).

INSOFT SIŪLO:
Galimybę prisidėti prie įvairių skaitmeninės transformacijos projektų.
Palaikymą ir mokymąsi iš kolegų, vadovų bei tarptautinių klientų.
Sveikatos paslaugų paketą - rūpinamės darbuotojais ne tik žodžiais.
Lankstumą derinant darbą iš ofiso ar namų.
Lankstų darbo laiką, planuojant rezultatus, o ne valandas.
Laisvę ir pasitikėjimą over micromanagement.
Konkurencingą rinkoje atlygį.
Maistas, vaisiai ir užkandžiai virtuvėlėje, kai sotūs, tuomet ir smagiau dirbasi.

INSOFT KULTŪRA:
2 kartus per savaitę team’ui dovanojame bendrus pietus.
Horizontalus įmonės valdymas reiškia, kad tikrai visi esame lygūs.
Nejaukūs gimtadieniai? Švenčiame kartą per mėnesį visi kartu.
Bendraujame vasaros spartakiadoje ir baidarėse.
Į INSOFT GALA metų pabaigoje kviečiame ir antras puses.
Mūsų vaikai susitinka kartu atšvęsti Kalėdų.
Mylime šunis, keturkojai ofise nestebina.
Gera pailsėti tarp darbų žaidimų kambary ar laisvalaikio zonoje.
Kiekvieną skatiname įsitraukti į socialinės atsakomybės projektus.

Mėnesinė alga (bruto): 3110 EUR - 4960 EUR (ekspertas).

Title: Java Spring Boot Developer
Description:
About the job
497120BR

Introduction

As an Application Developer, you will lead IBM into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment. The success of IBM is in your hands as you transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation. Your work will power IBM and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems. You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the world’s technology leader. Come to IBM and make a global impact!

Your Role and Responsibilities

IBM CIC Baltic Custom Development department is looking for a Java/Spring Boot developer. In this role, you will use the latest tools and technologies available to deliver state-of-the-art software. You'll be responsible for ensuring that software components are expertly designed, tested, debugged, verified, and ready for integration into IBM's best-of-breed solutions that help our clients improve their business outcomes in the global marketplace.

Job Responsibilities

Work in an agile, project-centric, team-focused environment
Travel to clients outside the country to gather and define requirements
Develop high-quality, scalable, and maintainable solutions with a focus on backend systems and related technologies
Perform unit and integration testing
Continuously learn new methodologies and technologies
Share your knowledge within the organization

Benefits

Personalized professional growth, mentoring, training, and clear career progression
Flexible work & life balance
Remote work opportunities
Compensation according to the market top rates
Private health insurance, life insurance, critical illness insurance
Salary range: 4000-4700 EUR gross (dependent on experience and knowledge).

Required Technical and Professional Expertise

Extensive work experience with Java and/or Spring Boot
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
Understanding of modern web application structure
Feeling comfortable in Agile / DevOps environment

Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise

Experience/Knowledge of Spring Cloud
Experience/Knowledge of additional programing languages/frameworks (like Node.js, Go, Python or .NET)
Experience with Docker and Kubernetes or OpenShift
Experience with at least one Cloud platform (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, IBM Cloud)
Knowledge of microservice design patterns and architecture
Pro-active involvement in IT communities and events

About Business Unit

IBM Consulting is IBM’s consulting and global professional services business, with market leading capabilities in business and technology transformation. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Our people are focused on accelerating our clients’ businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.

Your Life @ IBM

Are you craving to learn more? Prepared to solve some of the world's most unique challenges? And ready to shape the future for millions of people? If so, then it's time to join us, express your individuality, unleash your curiosity and discover new possibilities.

Every IBMer, and potential ones like yourself, has a voice, carves their own path, and uses their expertise to help co-create and add to our story. Together, we have the power to make meaningful change – to alter the fabric of our clients, of society and IBM itself, to create a truly positive impact and make the world work better for everyone.

It's time to define your career.

About IBM

IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business. At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.

Location Statement

IBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.

Being You @ IBM

IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

Title: Contract: Infrastructure Engineer (Cloud Engineering)
Description:
About the job
Upwork ($UPWK) is the world’s work marketplace. We serve everyone from one-person startups to over 30% of the Fortune 100 with a powerful, trust-driven platform that enables companies and talent to work together in new ways that unlock their potential.

Last year, more than $3.3 billion of work was done through Upwork by skilled professionals who are gaining more control by finding work they are passionate about and innovating their careers.

This is an engagement through Upwork’s Hybrid Workforce Solutions (HWS) Team. Our Hybrid Workforce Solutions Team is a global group of professionals that support Upwork’s business. Our HWS team members are located all over the world.

Must Haves (Required Skills)
Hands-on experience with microservices architectures: discovery, service to service communication patterns, high availability deployments
Moderate- to deep-level experience with at least one high-level programming language (Ruby, Python, Go)
Hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc.)
Hands-on experience with Infrastructure as Code tools (Terraform, CloudFormation, etc.)
Experience with Containerized deployments
Understanding of networking protocols like tcp/ip
Understanding of HTTP protocol
Nice To Haves (Not Required Skills)
Hands-on experience with a Container orchestration platform (K8s, ECS, Docker compose/swarm)
Knowledge of DevOps best practices used for software development, such as version control, collaboration, compliance, and CI/CD
Experience with security best practices as it relates to infrastructure design and interprocess communications
Experience with web proxies (nginx, envoy, haproxy)
If you are familiar with the following or want to learn, here are the technologies we use:
AWS Cloud: VPC, IAM, EC2, ECS, EKS, ELB, Route53, KMS, Cloudwatch, S3, RDS, DynamoDB, etc.
Terraform, CloudFormation, ArgoCD for infrastructure provisioning and continuous deployments
Jenkins and Argo Workflow based pipelines
Kubernetes and ECS for Container orchestration
Consul for service discovery and dynamic configuration
Vault for secret management
Istio for service mesh in Kubernetes
Prometheus Stack for monitoring and alerting
ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana) for logging
Kafka for asynchronous messaging
Java, Node.js, Python for building services and scripting
Upwork is proudly committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workforce. We never discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical condition), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.

Title: Frontend Developer (Remote - from Lithuania)
Description:
About the job
DappRadar is the #1 global leader in dapp distribution and analysis. Based in Lithuania, we are propelling blockchain and decentralized applications into the future. As we scale our solution to clients worldwide, we are looking for a skilled, solution-oriented Front-end Developer to join our team.

As our Front–end Developer, you will develop new user-facing features, interfaces, translate designs and wireframes into high quality mode.

Get ready to make an impact:
Developing new user-facing features using React.js.

Bringing ownership and strong attention to details.

Collaborate with other team members to carry out project deliverables

We offer:

The chance to personally impact a successful & rapidly growing startup in an emerging sector.
Be part of number one global leader in blockchain decentralized apps distribution and analysis company
Remote work position, flexible working hours concept and teamwork-based company culture
Personal learning budget & internal and external training sessions.
Competitive salary & stock options
"Family first" policy.

What you’ll bring:
Strong proficiency in Javascript
2+ years experience in using React.js, Redux
3+ years in developing web-based user interfaces.
Experience with common front-end development stack such as Webpack, yarn, nodeJs
Experience with responsive UI design (e.g., mobile first).
Extensive experience with code versioning tools (Git).
Familiarity with CRA, Next.js, Gatsby.
Good understanding of react hooks, styled components.
Strong focus on clean code, reusability.
Independent self-starter with great communication skills

It’s a plus if you have:
Interest in Blockchain technology, crypto ecosystem, and desire to learn new things.
Experience in gaming, FinTech industry.
Experience with blockchain libraries (web3.js, ethers.js, etc.).
Experience in building decentralized applications (dapps).
Experience with data visualization libraries (amCharts, D3.js, Chart.js, Highcharts, etc.).

Title: Paid HR Internship
Description:
About the job
As a market-leading credit management company, Intrum has wide-ranging expertise in debt collection services, and we do business in 24 countries in Europe plus Latin America (Brazil). We have more than 10,000 experienced employees in our group. As a result, we have a unique geographical size and scope. With market leadership however, comes great responsibility. We see ourselves as role models within our industry and have both the opportunity and responsibility to set new standards and change the way people perceive credit management. Through ethical and sustainable business practices we want to become the true benchmark of our industry.

To strengthen HR team, we are looking for an Intern to perform various HR administration related tasks: support all personnel related documentation in different databases, and handle employee life cycle management processes ensuring smooth collaboration with hiring managers, perform various audits. Seize this unique opportunity to take an active part in growing together with the rapidly developing organization.

About you:

Good communicational skills
Desire to learn
Very good knowledge of English language, both written and spoken
Prior recruitment experience in HR area (would be an advantage)

What we offer:

A flexible workplace providing more freedom to get the job done while managing the responsibilities of life
Culture of learning for individual career development and grow opportunities
Community driven environment where your experience matters

Rewards and recognition for individual contribution

Salary 800 Eur gross/month.

Join us on this exciting journey by sharing your experience and story 🤩

Title: iOS Software Engineer
Description:
About the job
Currently, we are looking for a Senior iOS Software Engineer to make our team even stronger.

The customer is leading the way as one of the largest and smartest video platforms, reaching over 300 million users today. The company has set some world records along the way — including the highest concurrent viewership at 25.3 million during the ICC Cricket World Cup 2019. On this project, you will build the future of TV.

About the Team
We're looking for Senior iOS developers who have rich experience and a good understanding of the iOS platform, excited to design and implement features for our iOS application. As a senior software development engineer, you’ll be responsible for implementing various features and improving the stability of our application. While our reach till now has been impressive, we are looking for technical & product-aware engineers individuals who will define the future architecture of our platform, providing technical and product expertise, mentor and guide developers. Come and be a part of our high-performance iOS team which is heavily focused on delivering an unmatchable user delight!

The pace of our growth is incredible – if you want to tackle hard and interesting problems at scale, and create an impact within an entrepreneurial environment, join us!

Your Key Responsibilities
Your role will be focused on improving, reworking, and reimagining our mobile application to deliver a high-performance system and highly engaging UI
You will be responsible for the delivery of critical business modules while developing optimized & modular code
You will take ownership of end-to-end product quality, from developing to maintaining core app frameworks that help make the apps more reliable and delightful
You will be part of the team that leads prototypes of new ideas and explore new technologies at the forefront of mobile technology

What to Bring
Expert-level knowledge of iOS development, including technologies like UIKit, Core Animation, Auto Layout, and Cocoa Touch
Excellent Swift and Objective-C coding ability along with strong CS & OS fundamentals
Ability to break down complex problems into simple, innovative solutions that serve a business need
A knack for problem-solving and ability to work in ambiguity
Entrepreneurial spirit, bias for action & ability to work independently

We Offer
Innovative solutions delivery to the world’s digital changes
Experience exchange with colleagues all around the world
Opportunities for self-realization
Unlimited access to LinkedIn learning solutions
Friendly team and enjoyable working environment
Engineering, corporate and social events
Social package: professional & soft skills trainings, medical & family care programs, sports
Additional vacations days
Free English classes
Flexible working schedule

Salary Ranges
Senior level 3500 - 5300 euro gross
Lead level 4000 - 6200 euro gross

Title: C++ Engineer (BUSINESS VoIP SOLUTIONS)
Description:
About the job
Job description

We are currently looking for an experienced, proactive and detail-oriented engineer to join our team in a new Orion Innovation office in Vilnius, Lithuania as C++ developer. We are looking for a self-motivated contributor with C++ fundamental knowledge and understanding of VoIP systems.
The customer is an American publicly traded provider of cloud-based communications and collaboration solutions for businesses.
The customer requested Orion Innovation, formerly MERA, to maintain development of the telephony backend services

Overall responsibilities:

· Be a part of SCRUM team

· Containerization/virtualization/orchestration concept understanding (Docker, Kubernetes)

We offer:

· Competitive salary and benefits
· Tolerant and diverse environment
· A friendly team of professionals
· Flexible working hours

· Training programs and excellent travel conditions
· Variety of recognition opportunities

Title: Javascript Developer
Description:

Would you like the chance to work with diverse and challenging projects that help you grow? We are now looking for a Javascript developer with vue.js experience to join our friendly and passionate team.

Bonus system

Title: Open Source Engineers
Description:
About the job
We have now been appointed to support a global consultancy that leverages the community-driven Open Source space in order to deliver the best solutions for their clients.

They are some of the most active Open Source contributors and maintainers across the globe, so when they are not working on client projects, they share their expertise and participate in Open Source projects.

They are happy to hear from anyone that is passionate about Open Source, but at the moment they are prioritising several roles and skill-sets:
Kernel CI - automation, pipelines, CI systems
Senior Linux Kernel Developers - low-level (performance, memory management etc)
DevOps Engineers - Cloud platforms (at least 2), Kubernetes
Software Engineers - Internal Tools - Python, Django
Graphics Engineers - Mesa, Vulkan, OpenGL, etc.

These roles are all fully remote and can be based anywhere in the world, and they also offer a strong benefits package which includes an annual 10% bonus scheme.

If you are passionate about Open Source technologies and want to use this passion to help businesses across the globe make the best use of them, apply now to find out more.

Title: Mid C++ Developer to work on Electron based Desktop Application
Description:
About the job
Bentley Systems

Mid C++ Developer to work on Electron based Desktop Application

Location: Vilnius/Kaunas, Lithuania, Hybrid

Product

ProjectWise is a suite of engineering project collaboration software from Bentley Systems designed for the architecture, engineering, construction (AEC) industries. It helps project teams to manage, share and distribute engineering project content and review in a single platform. We are looking for a software engineer, who would contribute to our software solutions, which expose ProjectWise functionality directly on Windows Desktop using Electron.

Responsibilities
Design responsibilities include participating in defining and interpreting feature requests, documenting those requests in functional specifications, and designing specific services and features for stability, security, usability, and maintainability
Implementation responsibilities include using the latest development tools to turn the designs into actual software products
Testing responsibilities include developing and maintaining unit and integration tests
Support responsibilities include maintaining the existing code base and aiding the support group

Required Knowledge, Skills, Abilities, And Experience
2+ years professional experience with C/C++
Solid understanding of software architecture and application lifespan
Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, software engineering or related field
Good verbal and written communication skills in English language
Ability to learn and adapt quickly to maximize productivity
Self-motivated person with the ability to work individually and as part of a team

Desirable Skills
Experience working with Desktop apps (and Electron)
Experience with common front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JS, TypeScript, React and Node.js
Experience in one or more relevant front-end frameworks such as React, Angular, etc.
Knowledge of Microsoft Azure cloud offerings and services
Knowledge of Agile, Scrum, CI, CD and DevOps processes

What We Offer
An exciting career as an integral part of a world-leading software company providing solutions for architecture, engineering, and construction.
Training and professional development opportunities (certifications programs, conferences etc.).
Challenging and interesting tasks at work every day, opportunity to work with highly skilled professionals on next generation software.
Making a positive impact to the world by creating future infrastructure.
Work environment that suits concentration as well as teamwork.
Additional annual leave days and extra paid days for different occasions (marriage, moving day, bereavement leave etc.).
Health insurance package and accidents insurance 24/7.
Referral program with bonus starting with 1500 Eur Gross.
Seniority bonus.
Opportunity to join Bentley’s employee stock purchase plan.
Possibility to choose 3rd pillar pension coverage.
Extra paid day for volunteering in organization of your choice.
Talent’s recognition program.
Ability to work from the office or home.

Please note if you are employed full-time salary for this position ranges from 3000 EUR gross (before taxes).

Who We Are

Bentley Systems (Nasdaq: BSY) is the infrastructure engineering software company. We provide innovative software to advance the world’s infrastructure – sustaining both the global economy and environment. Our industry-leading software solutions are used by professionals, and organizations of every size, for the design, construction, and operations of roads and bridges, rail and transit, water and wastewater, public works and utilities, buildings and campuses, and industrial facilities. Our offerings include MicroStation-based applications for modeling and simulation, ProjectWise for project delivery, AssetWise for asset and network performance, and the iTwin platform for infrastructure digital twins. Bentley Systems employs more than 4,000 colleagues and generates annual revenues of more than $700 million, in 172 countries. www.bentley.com

Title: Fullstack Developer
Description:
About the job
Right now, we are looking for experienced Fullstack Developer to the TOCA team in Customer Care Services. You will be a part of our journey becoming a new generation telecom operator, creating new ways of working and how we deliver value to our customers.

I’m Malin Holmlund, manager for the Customer Care Services team in Attended Channels unit. We have a global set up in my team with 22 employees and around 60 consultants working mainly in the Nordics and Baltics. We are a great bunch of people, and I am super proud of every single member of my team.

Is this your next opportunity?

As a Java developer in the TOCA team (Telia Order and Care), you will be a great contributor to build the future application for Telia Customer Service Representatives and support agents. TOCA is our north star and now we have kicked of our digitalization journey starting to build the core of TOCA based on common platform, common solutions, and common standard API’s cross Nordics and Baltics. We have a long journey ahead of us and we just started the work. Now you have the possibility to be part of building our future application, already from the start!

TOCA will be the thin attended portal with a strong focus on building best-in-class user experience for all Telia customer support agents’ cross countries, both in the B2B and B2C segment.

This will making the day-to-day work of thousands of Telia call center and Telia Store employees around the Nordics and Baltics in a better place to work. You will work alongside with skillful and caring colleagues, developing, and maintaining the systems and processes that delivers value to the business who are responsible to handle all our customer errands. A Scrum Master leads the daily work for the TOCA team that you will be part of, consisting of 5 developers today. We are heavily ramping up the team capacity and more colleagues will be part of the team moving forward.

We are on a journey of changing both our way of working, our delivery model, and our IT system landscape – moving towards Future IT. This put us in focus and gives us both responsibility and opportunities.

We have a six-country perspective, and You will work with different projects and initiatives from our stakeholders as well as take part in meetings where you will discuss and present ideas to improve our architecture, systems, and team.

Is this you?
Since our unit is spread across several countries, you need to have good communication skills and you need to be a true team player. I believe you are solution oriented, not afraid to initiate new solutions or initiatives, and have a natural drive to reach your goals and passion for new technologies, trends, patterns, and frameworks. Being analytical is a large plus.
Your main responsibilities:
Within the Delivery team deliver results to our stakeholders by develop and deploy solutions based on CI/CD pipeline
Co-operate with business (users) and other areas on common deliveries
Drive your area according to decisions and goals in a modern, agile and DevOps way
Your experience as a full stack developer:
Experience in Java 11+, Spring Boot
Experience in micro service architecture (e.g., using Kubernetes, Helm, Grafana)
Experience in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, React/Vue.js/Angular
Knowledge in domain driven design/architecture
Experience with multiple and complex web projects
Knowledge in SQL/JPA (e.g., using PostgreSQL)
Experience in agile development methods and practices, i.e., Scrum, SAFe, TDD
Experience in projects applying TDD, test automation and CI/CD would be considered as big advantage for you!
What will you find at our home?

We believe that people thrive in a purpose driven and values-oriented culture. Welcome to Telia the home to your next big opportunity. You will be part of an exciting journey to shape the New Generation Telco and we promise to help you grow, both professionally and personally. We believe in self-leadership where you take responsibility for expressing yourself and achieving great results. IT & telecommunications are not just our business, it’s our passion. You will join a winning team, to work with talented people and help create ideas and solutions for efficient business and better lives.

Working in this position you will receive a base salary from 2986 Eur (gross) to 4479 Eur (gross) plus annual bonuses which vary, depending on your competencies and your and Telia results. Besides for each employee Telia has additional employee benefits package which includes:
Health insurance and pension plan;
Various Telia and partners discounts and offers;
Additional vacation days;
Workation;
Flexibility that enables work-life balance;
Chance to grow both personally and professionally with our internal programs;
Open, relaxed and fun working environment;
19 000 awesome colleagues across Nordic & Baltics.
Interested?

If you fancy joining our team, don’t hesitate to apply! If you want to know more about the job you are welcome to contact me at malin.holmlund@teliacompany.com or LinkedIn.

We look forward to receiving your application and to make sure that your personal data is kept safely, we kindly ask you to apply through our recruitment system. We are not able to handle resumes via e-mail or equivalent.

Welcome to Telia – Home to your next big opportunity!

Title: Software Developer (Full Stack)
Description:
About the job
Job Posting End Date:

--

Xirgo Global provides a full range of global IoT telematics products and software. The company values clean code, good practices, co-creating, caring, and thinking outside the box, to make software scalable. They are working in Agile teams. Some of the technologies being used: Docker, Kubernetes, ElasticSearch, Kafka, Azure, .NET Core, Angular, RabbitMQ.

Xirgo Global company has become a part of Sensata Technologies since April 2021, which is a global industrial technology company and a leading provider of sensor-rich solutions that create insights for customers with operations in 13 countries, including China, Japan, Korea.

The Full Stack Software Developer is responsible for the creation, development, implementation and management of the cloud infrastructure, mobile applications and web portals.

Being one of the most important R&D departments, Xirgo Global is looking for a FULL-STACK SOFTWARE DEVELOPER DEVELOPER to join their team in Kaunas.

IN THIS POSITION YOU WILL
Be a part of the product team

Design product around microservices architecture
Manage cloud infrastructure using infrastructure as code (IaC)

Be able to influence what technologies to use

APPLY IF
You are a team player and have good communication skills, that are necessary when discussing with other team members about difficult topics

You take the full ownership for your code and are open to receive constructive feedback about it

As OneSensata, we are working together to make things work together

Title: Software Engineer (Java) in Online Meeting Booking
Description:
About the job
Job Description

Title: Software Engineer - Payments
Description:
About the job
In the last 10 years, Mambu has been revolutionising banking - making it more accessible, more straightforward and more inclusive for everyone. With fresh funding secured and a near €5 billion valuation we have huge ambitions for ourselves and the whole banking sector.

We bring this same sense of innovation and aspiration to how we support our people. We pioneered the 4 day summer work week, have announced the provision of equity for all and launched Our Mambu Deal to capture how we work with each other and what we offer all Mambuvians.

These are just the beginning. We’ll continue to look for ways to make Mambu an even better place to work.

We’re not here to play it safe.

We’re here to change the world.

What You’ll Do
Work with microservices and the associated architectural patterns (serverless computing, configuration as code, containers, CQRS, CDC, SAGA, etc.
Build resilient distributed systems at scale, with strong operational and performance KPIs
Cloud computing ( AWS & GCP - we are working on becoming cloud agnostic)
Be part of self managed cross functional agile teams
Be involved in all the aspects of the SDLC
Contribute to development of CI and CD pipelines
Work with an established payments schema ( SEPA EPC, Swift MX )
What You’ll Bring

Your experience includes:
Experience working in Java or .NET (willing to switch to Java)
Microservices / Event-Driven / Asynchronous APIs
Docker / Kubernetes
Nice to have: frontend experience JavaScript/HTML/CSS
Your Colleagues Would Say
Coding isn’t your only language and you love working in a team and can communicate in English as clear as day!
You’re not satisfied with what’s already available and have the ambition to revise and improve things in the name of progress
Mambu’s future

We are a diverse group of Mambuvians, and we are growing fast. Our eyes are on the future, and we believe we can use our technology and our talent to deliver banking experiences for billions that are also sustainable and inclusive and accessible.

Your future

We’re also focused on delivering a fantastic working experience for all Mambuvians. We pioneered the 4 day working week between June - August many years ago, and continue to innovate around how work should feel and how it should get done. Our Mambu Deal is how we articulate this relationship of support and dedication which drives us all forward.

To stay on top of the latest Fintech trends and our success stories, please follow us on LinkedIn.

To experience more of the Mambu culture in action, you can follow us on Facebook or Instagram or YouTube.

For more details regarding our global career opportunities, please visit our Career Site.

As part of the recruitment (or HR onboarding) process, you will be required to obtain authorized criminal background and credit screening results, as well as be queried against a sanctions/anti-money-laundering/counter terrorism financing/politically exposed persons screening service and your employment is conditional upon approval of these results.

Don’t meet every single requirement? Studies have shown that many job seekers (including women, people of colour and people from diverse backgrounds) are reluctant to apply to jobs unless they meet every single qualification.

Here at Mambu we are dedicated to building a diverse, inclusive and authentic workplace, so if you’re excited about this role but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyways. You may be just the right candidate for this or other roles.

Title: Backend Software Engineer
Description:
About the job
Vinted is Europe’s biggest pre-loved fashion marketplace, with 65+ million members in 16 countries. We want to make second-hand the first choice worldwide.

A team of 1,200+ people from Vinted’s offices in Vilnius, Berlin, Prague, and Amsterdam develop and support our platform. We share a unique work culture that’s based on aiming high, taking ownership, co-creating, caring, and growth.

Vinted is committed to building an inclusive workplace where people from all walks of life feel a sense of belonging. We welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, colour, national origin, citizenship, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, religion/beliefs, disability or age. We truly believe when we can be fully ourselves, we work better.

Vinted backend software engineers work in Product Engineering teams. These teams have all the main competences that are needed to ship new features to our members without outside help (cross-functional). Usually such teams have mobile platform developers (iOS, Android), web developers, and one or two backend software engineers. Backend software engineers are the ones who implement business logic and write APIs that our mobile and web platforms can use. Backend software engineers are also responsible for growing our backend platform to handle a wider scale.

Team Vinted is looking for a backend software engineer who’s skilled at writing elegant code and likes to work on big-scale projects.

Your main aim will be preparing our product for the challenges that lie ahead and making sure it contributes to the Vinted vision of making second-hand the first choice.

This is a partly remote work opportunity, so you have the possibility to stay based in your city, and to only work in the Vilnius office 2-3 days per week (once the quarantine period has ended).

In This Position, You’ll
Work in a team and shape the features to make our members’ life better.
Apply Agile and Lean principles in your work.
Collaborate with other developers through GitHub pull requests and code reviews.
Write unit tests (RSpec) for all of the code you write. We have >10000 tests which run in ~5 minutes through our Jenkins setup.
See your code affect 65+ million users almost instantly. Our master branch gets rolled out straight to production on each merge. We deploy many times per day.
Work with Ruby on Rails, MySQL, Memcached, Elasticsearch and many more technologies. We don't expect you to be familiar with any of them beforehand.
Craft the code which can handle more than 2M requests per minute. Monitor your deployed code through Kibana, Grafana, DataDog and new tools that you will introduce :)
About You
You should be willing to learn and master new technologies and concepts.
We expect you to be familiar with most, and have deep knowledge in some (depending on your seniority) of the following disciplines: Software Engineering, Functional Programming, Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, Web Development, Systems Programming, Distributed Systems, Systems Architecture, Computer Science.
Work Perks
Opportunity to join our share options programme
Learning budget (13.2 % from net yearly salary)
25 working days of holiday
Remote workout classes
Mental- and emotional-health support from Mindletic
Monthly team-building events
A personal budget for shopping on Vinted
Private health insurance
Work anywhere in the EU for 90 days out of the year
Dog-friendly office
Home office support (IT workstation equipment provided + a personal budget of up to 540 € for home workplace furniture)
We want people to work from where they’re most comfortable, which is why we’re using a hybrid workplace model at Vinted for the foreseeable future.

Hybrid means that we encourage working from the office on Tuesdays and Wednesdays and the remainder of your time from either home or the office, but it’s not required. You’re welcome to work from either location all or some of the time, depending on what you think is best and safest for you, and how the Covid-19 situation is developing where you are.

The salary range for this position is 3379–6480 € (gross) per month.

If this sounds interesting - you may well be just who we need. We’re looking for backend software engineers to join Vinted Product Engineering in their work. We have a few positions available and we are looking for specialists with varying experience - from mid to senior.

If you’re interested, contact us and we will be in touch with you.

Plus, take a look at engineering.vinted.com to see what we’re up to.

Title: Software Engineer, Full Stack JavaScript
Description:
About the job
Description

We create powerful, beautiful and intuitive digital products. We don't blindly follow trends. We take our understanding of the latest technologies and build the best solutions for our enterprise clients. We’re big believers in collaboration across engineering, UX and product teams. We combine our individual expertise to solve complex challenges.

Salary offer for the candidate is determined based on the predefined salary ranges for the position and depends on the level of competence and experience of the candidate.

Title: Software Engineer/ С++ Developer (m/f/d)
Description:
About the job
Atotech, a brand within the Materials Solutions Division of MKS Instruments, develops leading process and manufacturing technologies for advanced surface modification, electroless and electrolytic plating, and surface finishing. Applying a comprehensive systems-and-solutions approach, Atotech’s portfolio includes chemistry, equipment, software, and services for innovative and high-technology applications in a wide variety of end-markets. With its innovative strength and industry-leading global TechCenter network, MKS delivers pioneering solutions through its Atotech brand – combined with unparalleled on-site support for customers worldwide. For more information about Atotech, visit atotech.com.

What the role involves:
Perform SCADA (including HMI and PLC components) features development and bug fixing
Collaborate with QA and follow their requirements in terms of quality.
Follow Agile processes in team
Be concentrated on SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle)
Be concentrated on quality (Code review, Focus on tests, Documentation)

Ideally you have:
Strong knowledge of C++ (C++14/17)
Experience with cross platform programming
Knowledge of technical English language
More than 5 years of experience in software development

Nice to have:
Experience with Python
Experience with Git version control systems, Jira
Experience with test-driven development (TDD) methodology
Experience with SECS/GEM, SQL, gRPC
OPC UA or/and OPC Classic communication protocols.
Experience with various fieldbuses (Modbus, EtherCAT, etc)

What can you expect at Atotech?
Personal development opportunity. The team is expanding, and we advocate breakthrough thinking to drive business and personal growth.
Diversity: We value individual differences and build an environment of trust within our diverse workforce.
Integrity: We act openly, honestly, and ethically. Integrity guides our everyday behavior and actions. At Atotech, we speak up for integrity.
Passion: We are a passionate team, and we influence each other. We proactively assume responsibility and deliver on our promises.
Commitment to Quality: We aim to achieve excellence in everything we do. We achieve high standards for both our internal and external customers.
Open-feedback culture and friendly office environment
Extensive orientation support
Flexibility in working hours and (partially) in terms of location
We offer an attractive compensation and benefit package

Title: Javascript Developer (React.js)
Description:
About the job
What you’ll do:
Join the green-field project with a new team.
Add new functionality and UI components to existing systems using Frontend technologies.
Be involved in the work of several teams, find solutions for complex challenges, and work under minimal supervision
Dig deep and try to understand the bigger picture in order to foresee the consequences
Use design patterns and program in an agile manner (scrum, pull requests)
Help the client in taking technological and design decisions

The Software Engineer-III designs, develops, troubleshoots, and debugs software programs for software enhancements and new products. Develops software tools including operating systems, compilers, routers, networks, utilities, databases, and Internet-related tools. The Software Engineer-III designs, develops, troubleshoots, and debugs software programs for software enhancements and new products. Develops software tools including operating systems, compilers, routers, networks, utilities, databases, and Internet-related tools. Determines software’s compatibility with hardware and/or influences software's design in relation to hardware.

Title: Software Engineer Web Front-End (Senior)
Description:
About the job
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Who We Are

Unify Square, Inc. is a Bellevue, WA USA-based rapidly growing hi-tech company with multiple subsidiaries in the European and Asia-Pacific regions. Unify Square’s software and services optimize and enhance the world’s largest collaboration and communication deployments, helping businesses manage and secure their meetings, chats, and calls. Founded by Microsoft product visionaries Unify Square has become a global elite partner for Microsoft Teams, Slack, Zoom, Skype for Business, Workplace by Facebook, and Office 365. Unify Square solutions have delivered value to more than 5 million collaboration seats, in over 300 enterprises across more than 50 countries, and in most major industry verticals.

Why Join Unify Square

Unify Square solutions are game-changers in the Collaboration and Communication world – that’s why we’re on a mission to hire those who share our passion. You will be interacting on a daily basis with your colleagues around the world who are some of the brightest people in the industry. Our Vilnius team is a friendly group of energetic men and women who enjoy each other’s company and often engage in group activities outside of work hours, be it a BBQ lunch in the inner yard of the office building, a company-sponsored half-marathon run, or a friendly game of foosball in the office lounge area. The office is located in the center of the Old Town with easy access to many lunch options. Snacks and beverages are also provided in the office.Salary: 4000 - 5000 GROSS

As a Software Engineer, You Have
Passion for creating robust and reliable enterprise software
Passion for crafting excellent User Experience and polished UI
Strong software design and development skills
Ability to grasp new technologies and APIs very quickly
Ability to work effectively and independently as well as part of a team.
Ability to communicate clearly and effectively, both in writing and verbally
Ability to communicate directly with stakeholders, capture requirements effectively, analyze and prioritize requirements. Must be able to produce solutions that address customer needs
Ability to prioritize requirements and work on multiple work streams and deliverables while maintaining focus
Accountability for overall ownership of a feature area / end-to-end feature.
Strong Troubleshooting skills
Core Skills

Successful candidates for the position will have:
Expertise and passion working with enterprise customers and internal partners to understand their scenarios and business drivers
Ability to create UI independently starting from Lo-Fi prototypes
Strong problem solving and analytical skills
Excellent technical and functional design skills
Strong written and oral communication skills in English
Demonstrated success in building strong relationships and delivering results in cross-group projects
Willingness to explore alternative solutions and propose new ideas
Experience:
Minimum 3 years, ideally 5 years or more of relevant experience creating products for the global enterprise market
Proficiency in Javascript & TypeScript
Proficiency in HTML and CSS
Knowledge of the React library and React development patterns (Function Components, Hooks, etc.)
Experience with Microsoft technologies and services (Azure, DevOps, Microsoft Graph, etc.)
Experience with Authentication and Authorization technologies (OAUTH, Token based authentication, etc.)
Experience with secure coding practices, OWASP, threat modeling tools, including security knowledge fundamentals (encryption, authentication, role-based access, etc.)
Familiarity with design, development, and testing of enterprise applications user interfaces

Nice to have Experience:
Experience creating UI mockups
Experience with WebPack/Rollup/react-scripts/Lerna
Experience with Docker / Kubernetes
Experience with PowerShell Scripting and Azure Dev Ops
Education:
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or a related field or equivalent work experience in the industry required
Master’s Degree in Computer Science (preferred)
If this sounds like you, then we would love to hear from you. Please go to the Unify Square careers page at https://www.unifysquare.com/careers/#main and apply today!

Title: Angular Software Engineer
Description:
About the job
The product was founded in 2012 because we wanted to do things differently. Simpler, smarter, and more advantageous for our customers. Because we believe we can help everyone maximize their financial affairs. "Feel at ease when it comes to your finances. Every day." By combining smart technical solutions with a healthy dose of human intelligence, we create financial services that really meet your needs. Add to that some of the sublime personal services from our employees and you end up with something that's truly unique to the world of finance!

In a nutshell
Our Software Engineering team is actively developing and maintaining a few existing mobile applications and websites, and are gearing up to an entirely new platform which will eventually encompass our existing offerings. You will work on our closed bank domain. You bring extensive knowledge of design, analysis, development, testing, integration, architecture, and more, to help your team raise its game, while exceeding industry standards in terms of quality and security. On a day to day basis you, together with your teammates, will build our new financial platform, and shape the strategy for the whole department. Within your expertise group, you will research and recommend tools, languages, and libraries/frameworks. You will participate in the definition and refinement of the overall quality and security metrics.

Tech stack
Frontend: Angular 9+, TypeScript, RXJS, Karma, SASS
Backend: NodeJS
Deployment: AzureDevOps, Docker, Terraform, Fargate and AWS

The Team
IT team consists of about 170 passionate people. Together we build and run the bank and all associated products. The success of the product has made us decide to develop more and more inhouse, tailor-made solutions, phasing-out the current off-the-shelf IT-solutions, in order to accelerate and disrupt banking.

Your Profile
To be successful in this role it would be great when you have:
Strong experience developing web application using JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS.
Solid experience with Angular (at least 3 years), TypeScript and RXJS.
Knowledge of modern frontend tools like Webpack, NPM and NodeJS.
Experience with NodeJS and lambdas is a big plus
Familiar with modern authentication standards (OAuth and OpenID)
An eye for clean code and you always write tests for your code.
You are a team player

Salary Ranges
Middle level 2800 - 4100 euro gross
Senior level 3500 - 5300 euro gross
Lead level 4800 - 6200 euro gross
